pageContext.title: Open Annotation Collaboration
pageContext.description_excerpt: interoperable annotation environment that allows leveraging annotations across the boundaries of annotation clients, annotation servers, and content collections. To this end, interoperability specifications will be devised.
pageContext.participants: Allen Renear, Anna Gerber , Carole Palmer , Clare Llewellyn , Daniel Cohen , Doug Reside, Herbert Van de Sompel , James Smith, Jane Hunter , John Burns , Kirsten Keister, Neil Fraistat, Robert Sanderson , Ron Chernich, Sean Takats , Tim Cole, Tom Habing
